Package sentinel.ged

Class Summary
GECAAgent This GECAAgent class is provided to support the global event detection.
GEDInterface This GEDInterface class is provided to support a communication between a local event detector and a global event detector.
GEDMesgRecvImp This class provids the "onMessage" method for a remote invocation.
GlobalEvent The global class is used to construct global event nodes on the server.
GlobalEventFactoryImp This class provides the methods for creating a global event from the remote site.
GlobalEventHandle This global event handle class is used in composite event definitions.
GlobalNodeManager This class in used to manage the global event node.
NotificationSenderThread This runnable thread helps the global even detection to send the notification to the consumer.
NotifMesgBuffer The buffer is used to stores notification messages.
ServerConnectorImp The class is provided to support the client registration.
